articles.description: European Ryder Cup captain Luke Donald will have been buoyed by recent victories for Guido Migliozzi, Robert MacIntyre and Shane Lowry as the build-up to next year's event gets into full swing, writes Iain Carter.
articles.content:
Guido Migliozzi hit a stunning second shot at Le Golf National's 18th hole to set up his victory on Sunday
It has been an encouraging spell for Europe's Ryder Cup captain Luke Donald, who will have … [+4610 chars]
